10. expulsus etat: the perfect indicative usually follows post- quam; but whenever a definite amount of time is given, the plu· perfect is used. Cimon was recalled in 457 ; the fite years' peace was not arranged till 4 51.

11. hospitio: almost all Greek states had their guest-friend- ships. He, how· ever, was expected to help and befn'end any Lacedaemonian who came to Athens. See on hospitium, p. 16, l. 11.
